p: Rituximab is another biologic drug that has been associated with an increased risk of certain infections. It is a chimeric, monoclonal antibody that targets CD20 on B-lymphocytes leading to rapid B cell depletion. Its use has been associated with reactivation of hepatitis B, severe Pneumocystis jirovecii (carinii) infection, and progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy (PML)Â [ 6].
